summary: The story of a father and two teen-aged sons, and the rivalry between the two siblings as they begin to discover the attraction of girls.
cast: Akira Ishihama|Chishû Ryû|Kuniko Miyake|Yôko Kosono|Motoji Fujiwara|Motoo Isogai|Ryûji Kita|Keijirô Morozumi|Tsutomu Niijima|Naruaki Noto|Yoshiko Shima|Toshio Shimamura|Susumu Takase|Keiji Tsuchida
title: Musuko no seishun
